#summary Layout Description

= Introduction =

A Layout is how to organize your sources on the display


= Details =

In WebcamStudio, you can setup your sources as you want.  With Layouts, it means that you can have several setup in a single studio.

Let's say that you may have one layout for the intro of your broadcast, another for your main webcam, another to show some sponsors add, and a last one for having a host with another webcam, side by side.

The Layout class is simply a container for [LayoutItem], it will manage the order of each LayoutItem, each one containing a source.  

The Layouts are managed by the compoenent LayoutManager which is a Treeview and a tabular control panel.
